name: Board Games of Two: Backgammon
description:
Play friends, random opponents, or the computer in this award winning bundle that includes Backgammon, Checkers, 4 in a Row, Mancala, Tic Tac Toe and more.
Tired of clicking so many apps for different board games?
Do you want to challenge yourself or just kill time in leisure time?
Then this app must be perfect to you!
